column4: any help to recover my icons, i tried all recommended in many, many forums, but no luck, still no havinevloution, file-roller, etc, icon into their menu bars
when you open the gnome menu, go to an application, you can right click it with the mouse and say to add it to the panel
hot those icons... the icons in menubar, i have only red ex
right click gnome menu -> menu editor. i can enable/disable the installed application icons there
